channel.title: CVE Feed for McAfee, LLC -- McAfee Web Advisor (WA)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for McAfee, LLC -- McAfee Web Advisor (WA)

item.title: CVE-2019-3666|2024-08-04T19:12:09.602Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- mcafee%20web%20advisor%20%28wa%29
item.description: API Abuse/Misuse vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Web Advisor (WA) prior to 4.1.1.48 allows remote unauthenticated attacker to allow the browser to navigate to restricted websites via a carefully crafted web site.

item.title: CVE-2019-3665|2024-08-04T19:12:09.722Z -- mcafee%2C%20llc -- mcafee%20web%20advisor%20%28wa%29
item.description: Code Injection vulnerability in the web interface in McAfee Web Advisor (WA) prior to 4.1.1.48 allows remote unauthenticated attacker to allow the browser to render a website which Web Advisor would normally have blocked via a carefully crafted web site.
